data.message: My old account is disabled and I filled out the form and appeal in the help center still can't get my old account from being disabled I have a lot of pics I don't want to lose please help

replies.message: Hi Franklin. If you have reported this issue to our team, please sit tight while we take the time to review it. Rest assured that we are looking into all the reports that we receive. Thanks for your patience. -Joe
how long does it generally take I was in the process of selling items and I'm panicking because I don't want my pics gone forever :(
Joe with Facebook if I done something wrong to have it disable I will remove the content and the issue won't happen again. I honestly don't know what I done :(
